attributes.action: DEPORT FOREIGN NATIONALS ,  IMMEDIATELY ,  UPON CONVICTION.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THERE ARE MANY FOREIGN NATIONALS SERVING SENTENCES IN BRITISH PRISONS - AT THE BRITISH TAXPAYERS' EXPENSE! AFTER SERVING THEIR SENTENCE MANY ARE DEPORTED . IT WOULD MAKE MORE ECONOMIC SENSE TO DEPORT THESE PEOPLE IMMEDIATELY UPON CONVICTION , THUS SAVING THE EXPENSE OF KEEPING THEM IN BRITISH PRISONS AND ALSO FREEING-UP MUCH NEEDED PRISON SPACE FOR BRITISH CONVICTS .

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
